Package peregrine

Main peregrine package including core interfaces for writing jobs.

See:
          Description

Interface Summary
KeyValuePair Create a key/value pair used to represent and entry in computation.
 

Class Summary
Batch A 'batch' of jobs sent to the controller at once.
Job Represents a job (map, merge, or, reduce) which much be run by Peregrine.
Mapper A map task implementation which maps keys to values and then emits them.
Merger A merger implementation that performs a merge against two data sets.
Record A record is an entry in the database representated as both a key and a value.
Reducer Take a key and list of values, and reduce them and emit result.
StructReader API for dealing with complex data structures as high level types.
StructReaders Create a StructReader around primitive types, varints, hashcodes, etc.
StructWriter Write data to a struct and convert it to a StructReader when done.
 

Package peregrine Description

Main peregrine package including core interfaces for writing jobs.
